content.rendered:
• Understanding of Angular CLI , Angular Modules, Components & Templates.
  • Understanding the fully synchronous behavior of PHP.
  • Understanding of MVC design patterns.
  • Knowledge of object oriented PHP programming.
  • Strong knowledge of Angular Forms, Observables & RxJS, Services,HttpClient, Directives &
    Pipes and Angular Materials
  • Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application.
  • Familiarity with SQL/ NoSQL databases and their declarative query languages.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
  • Must have sound analytical skills & a structured, methodical coding style.
  • Ability to adjust schedules to meet deadlines will be crucial.
  • Must be self-motivated and take responsibility for his/her own deliverables.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects & lead the development effort while meeting deadlines and
    maintaining high-quality results.
